summary: The diff implements all three requirements (REQ-1, REQ-2, REQ-3) with comprehensive coverage. REQ-1 branding changes are evident across index.html, AppHeader.tsx, HomePage.tsx, and App.tsx. REQ-2 theme system is implemented via useTheme hook, ThemeToggle component, and index.css color variables. REQ-3 logo integration is visible in AppHeader.tsx referencing the required asset path. All acceptance criteria appear to be addressed based on the available evidence.
